Pre-Game Insights: For France's match against Italy in the Nations League, Les Bleus will be playing at the heart of the Parc des Princes on September 6, 2024.
Tickets are still available for this first match of the season starting at 79 euros.
Les Bleus' first opponents in the group phase are Italy, Belgium, and Israel, with two matches starting in September.
The French team will need to make a fine start to the competition to build up their confidence after a lacklustre Euro, which saw them beaten in the semi-finals.
The match against Italy will be held at the Parc des Princes, not the Stade de France, at 8:45pm.
The French team will need support to get back on track in the Nations League.
